type DataSourceProvider = class interface INotifyPropertyChanged interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 对象的公共基类和协定，它们是执行某些查询以生成可以用作绑定源对象的单个对象或对象列表的工厂。

span.span: Common base class and contract for objects, which are factories that execute some queries to produce a single object or a list of objects that you can use as binding source objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是围绕现有数据模型的便利包装;它不会替换任何数据模型。 is a convenience wrapper around an existing data model; it does not replace any data model. 数据访问接口不会尝试将数据模型（例如 ADO）的复杂性和通用性紧缩为一个具有几个属性的单个对象。A data provider does not attempt to condense the complexity and versatility of a data model such as ADO into one single object with a few properties. 是一个抽象类。 is an abstract class. 使用一个派生类，即 和 。Use one of the derived classes, which are and . 知道 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 线程处理和调度程序模型。The is aware of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] threading and dispatcher model. 它在创建时将线程假定为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程。It assumes the thread at creation time to be the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 事件将从工作线程封送到应用程序的 UI 线程。Events will get marshaled from a worker thread to the UI thread of the application.

span.span: The base class delays the call if refresh is deferred or initial load is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **对实现者的说明：** 您可以选择在同一线程上或在后台线程上或使用执行查询 `IsAsynchronous` 。**Notes to Implementers:** You can choose to execute the query on the same thread or on a background thread or using `IsAsynchronous`. 查询完成后，调用 以更新公共属性。When the query is complete, call to have the public properties updated.

summary.span: 进入延迟循环，该循环可用于更改提供程序的属性并延迟自动刷新。

span.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to change properties of the provider and delay automatic refresh.

returns.span: 一个可用于释放调用对象的 对象。

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的用法是 `using` 使用此方法创建一个范围，然后在该范围内进行多个属性更改。The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple property changes within the scope. 这会延迟自动刷新，直到延迟周期退出。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

summary.span: 启动对基础数据模型的初始查询。

span.span: Starts the initial query to the underlying data model.

summary.span: 结果返回到 属性。

span.span: The result is returned on the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当依赖数据绑定处于激活状态时，绑定引擎通常会调用此方法。This method is typically called by the binding engine when dependent data bindings are activated. 设置 为 `false` 以阻止或延迟自动加载数据。Set to `false` to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data. 可以多次调用此方法。The method can be called multiple times. 访问接口在执行初始查询后将忽略后续调用;当再次调用时，提供程序不会重新启动已运行的查询 。The provider ignores subsequent calls once it is busy executing the initial query; the provider does not restart an already running query when is called again. 查询成功完成后，任何 调用仍不会重新查询数据。When the query finishes successfully, any call still does not re-query data. 操作通常是异步的， 当 属性假定为新值时，将引发事件。The operation is typically asynchronous, a event is raised when the property assumed a new value. 应用程序调用 来刷新数据。The application calls to cause a refresh of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，在 第一次使用绑定或时将运行其查询并设置其属性 。Typically the runs its query and sets its property the first time it is used by a binding or a . 可以通过将 属性设置为来忽略此步骤 `false` 。You can omit this step by setting the property to `false`. 在这种情况下，应用程序必须显式调用 ，以使提供程序获取其数据。In this case, the application must explicitly call to cause the provider to obtain its data.

span.span: The data that is the result of the query.

summary.span: 派生类调用此方法以指示查询已完成。

span.span: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从任何线程调用此回调。This callback can be called from any thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 设置任何公共属性之前和引发任何事件之前，此实现将结果封送回给线程。This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnQueryFinished (object newData, Exception error, System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationCallback completionWork, object callbackArguments);

summary.span: 派生类调用此方法以指示查询已完成。

span.span: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从任何线程调用此回调。This callback can be called from any thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 设置任何公共属性之前和引发任何事件之前，此实现将结果封送回给线程。This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 启动对基础数据模型的刷新操作。

span.span: Initiates a refresh operation to the underlying data model.

summary.span: 结果返回到 属性。

span.span: The result is returned on the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刷新操作通常是异步的， 当 属性假定为新值时，将引发事件。A refresh operation is typically asynchronous, a event is raised when the property assumed a new value. 如果刷新操作失败，则 属性设置为 `null` ; 属性设置为错误异常。If the refresh operation fails, the property is set to `null`; the property is set with the error exception. 在 上一次刷新仍在进行时，应用程序可以调用。The application can call while a previous refresh is still underway. 调用 两次将引发 事件两次。Calling twice raises the event twice.
